title: Tifosi Rail XC First Look: Budget Sunglass Doesn’t Miss Marks
content:
The Rail XC exhibits Tifosi's "sunglasses for all" concept with a palatable price tag and a shallow shape to fit more wearers.

The post Tifosi Rail XC First Look: Budget Sunglass Doesn’t Miss Marks appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
